message: Let's be fair and split the money almost evenly, with a slight advantage for me considering the inflation rate. This way we both benefit greatly from this opportunity!
Your offer was tempting, Alice, but the inflation rate hurts you more than it hurts me. How about we tip the scales slightly in my favor this time?
Bob, it's clear that dragging this out only hurts us both. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution. Let's not lose any more money to inflation!
